title: GONE: N300 Mayo's Brouthers, Duffy, & Ward

posts.post_title: GONE: N300 Mayo's Brouthers, Duffy, & Ward
posts.post_content: GONE---I'm asking . for the SGC 50 Brouthers (Baltimore), . for the SGC 55 Duffy, & for the SGC 50 Ward (2nd base).  Crease-free, sharp cards with strong images from a condition sensitive set.  The cards are shown ungraded, but were shipped by SGC today.  I'm open to offers, especially if you're interested in all three. Please email me at jpcw1999@yahoo with any questions.  Prices include shipping & insurance.  Thanks, Jeremy.---ALL GONE
Wow!  Good luck with the sales!
